title: Draggable Dialogue
description: Minimal recreation of Figma's comment component.

title: Animated Gradient SVG Button
description: Animate SVG button with fading gradient.Beautiful and subtle micro-interaction inspired by dating app TanTan's bottom tab navigator's button icon.

title: Dialog Height Transition
description: Change dialog height based on content. Inspired by About This Mac tabbed dialogue.

title: Sticky Header Links
description: Make a portion of hero section sticky when scrolled.

title: Graduated Frosty Overlay
description: Graduated frosty overlay on images. Inspired by AppleTV app.

title: Loaded Image Transition
description: Transition from plain background colour to image using image tag onload event.

title: Bottom Tab Navigator
description: A simple tab bar on the bottom of the screen that lets you switch between different routes.

title: iOS Header
description: Large collapsible animated title just like native iOS apps, implemented using React Hooks and CSS.
